sqlMap.statement: SELECT PRPTY2VAL "Prpty2Val" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM08 WHERE PRPTYNAME = #key# AND PRPTYGROUPNAME = #PrptyGroupName#
SELECT PRPTYNAME "PrptyName", PRPTY2VAL "Prpty2Val" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM08 WHERE PRPTYGROUPNAME = #PrptyGroupName#
SELECT SUBSTR(PRPTYGROUPNAME, 12, LENGTH(PRPTYGROUPNAME)-12) AS "AA", PRPTY2VAL "Prpty2Val" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM08 WHERE PRPTYNAME = 'WEBSERVERPORT'
